entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • New rename dialog always renames file once checkbox is selected #60294

Closed

  • Add option to always use known symbol servers for embedded and Source Link navigation #59712
    17.2
  • Typo: "Apply namespace matches folde preferences" #60213
  • C# compiler should not produce 'CS8618 Non-nullable field must contain a non-null value when exiting constructor' warning with null check in constructor #60283
  • IDE0004 incorrectly reported when casting from nullable enum to nullable int; applying codefix results in non-compilable code #60292

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SDK version in docs, etc. #60299
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add Rebuild badge to README #60298
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Check accessibility before offering "Implement interface" codefix #60297
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Change Visual Studio Cache version to stop restoring System.Text.Encodings.Web 4.6.0 #60296
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60295
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.3 #60291
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Updating our DiaSymReader.Native support #60290
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Initialize MEF parts before switching to the UI thread #60289
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Option to always use default symbol servers for GTD #60053
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Edit the breaking change doc for publishing on docs #60260
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #60188
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix a typo and an inconsistency #60238
    Community, auto-merge, Next
  • Implement classification for UTF8 String Literals #60265
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Fix issue with remove-unnecessary-cast and necessary explicit casts. #60293
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Correct change ObjectCreationExpression to ImplictObjectCreationExpression for SmartBreakline #60249
    Next
  • Add syntax normalizer tests for UTF8 String Literals. #60269
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Implement QuickInfo for UTF8 String Literals #60268
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Add F1HelpTests for `checked` keyword. #60258
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.3 #60247
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60261
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Fix conversion issues in null coalescing operator #60202
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #60300
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Check for reference assembly before deciding which language to show #60271
    Area-IDE
  • Implicit field initialization in struct constructors #59788
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't add async modifier for non-awaitable return method #55983
    Area-IDE
  • Add basic TS LSP server #59639
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Compiler warning CS8600 message: say possibly null-valued expression #58860
    Area-Compilers
  • AbstractFlowPass.VisitStackAllocArrayCreation should use the regular way for visiting initializer #60210
    Area-Compilers
  • Add analyzer/fixer that notifies people about explicit (but hidden) casts the compiler generates for foreach-statements. #60120
    Area-IDE
  • Update some netcore packages to 6.0.0 #58570
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix type parameter scoping for local functions #60098
    Area-Compilers
  • Improve error message for unmatched override that uses 'T?' #55624
    Area-Compilers
  • Features/utf8 string literals #59774
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only
  • Implement source generator timing APIs #60267
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Backport lock contention fixes to 17.1 #60130
    Area-IDE
  • Fix top-level speculation #60274
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Cache built skeleton assemblies so they can be reused on next launch without rebuilding them. #57826
    Area-Compilers
  • Move more package initialization to BG. #60211
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Revert "Initialize default capabilities before switching to the UI th…" #60282
    Area-IDE
